description: Watch Kevin de Bruyne's best goals for Manchester City
title: Watch Kevin de Bruyne's best goals for Manchester City
title_page: Watch Kevin de Bruyne's best goals for Manchester City - BBC Sport
maintext:
As Kevin de Bruyne prepares to hang up his boots at Etihad Stadium at the end of this season, it would be rude not to look back at his best goals for the current Premier League champions.
Since signing for a then club-record Â£55m from Wolfsburg in August 2015, the midfielder has scored 106 goals for the club - making him the first Manchester City midfielder to reach a century of goals since Colin Bell.
